import React from "react"; function Containeritems(props) { let { title, description, imageUrl, newsUrl, date, author, source, price, rating, reviews, } = props; return ( <>
{props.title}

{props.description}

Price: {props.price}

Rating: {props.rating}

Reviews: {props.reviews}
Buy / Read More
); } export default Containeritems;
